article_title: A second Utah Jazz player tests positive for coronavirus as NBA considers next steps
article_description: A second Utah Jazz player has tested positive for coronavirus  the NBA team said Thursday  a day after the league abruptly suspended its season because of news that the virus had impacted the Utah club
article_content: CNN A second Utah Jazz player has tested positive for coronavirus  the NBA team said Thursday  a day after the league abruptly suspended its season because of news that the virus had impacted the Utah club Meanwhile  at least two teams that recently played   2163 chars
